thread.section_title: World Nomads Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Nomads | worldnomads.com
thread.title: Kyle P
thread.title_full: World Nomads reviewed by Kyle P

author: Kyle P
title: Kyle P
text: At first I was frustrated with the long wait times in getting a response with any useful information. I also felt like I was being sent back and forth with no one taking ownership. After getting in touch with the right contact, they expedited everything and were very professional to deal with. It has overall been a positive experience and I would recommend them.
